message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this exceptional product. Given its value, I'm seeking a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is reflective of its worth and the benefits it will bring you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $900,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't accept anything below $1,200,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Thank you for standing firm on your valuation, Alice. I understand the product's worth to you, but unfortunately, I cannot go above $1,050,000. I hope this offer aligns better with your expectations.
